alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, west central Livingston, east central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gonzales, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, Port Vincent, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Prairieville, Village St. George, Inniswold, Shenandoah and Gardere. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 163 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension
